title: El Salvador Buys the Dip, Accumulates 1,098 BTC in 7 Days

title: El Salvador creates history: Becomes world’s first country to adopt Bitcoin as legal currency
description: El Salvador is now officially the first country in the world to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender. title: El Salvador’s finance minister says bitcoin crash poses fiscal risk
description:

title: Aim to reduce inflation to 4%, but El Nino a challenge: Das

title: Inflation climbs to highest level since January, beef prices soar
description:
